description:
(nova.api.openstack.wsgi): TRACE:     networks = common.get_networks_for_instance(context, instance)
(nova.api.openstack.wsgi): TRACE:   File "/home/cbehrens/openstack/nova/comstud-nova.git/nova/api/openstack/common.py", line 319, in get_networks_for_instance
(nova.api.openstack.wsgi): TRACE:     cached_nwinfo = instance['info_cache']['network_info']
(nova.api.openstack.wsgi): TRACE: TypeError: 'NoneType' object is unsubscriptable
(

This shouldn't really happen...  but I ran into this in my environment while testing 'cells'.  Probably better to be safe than sorry, so we should check info_cache being None.
title: raise in API when there's no instance_info_cache entry for an instance
